A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the movie is not perfect\, I do think it is the most interesting since A New Hope\, there're some thrilling moments\, good humor\, great surprises....\n\nI understand that a lot of people didn't like it\, however the trailer warned us... this is not going to be the way you think... also lot of people are complaining about the unanswered questions... wer'e at the middle of the trilogy... a lot of things could happen and this uncertanty adds something more\, actually we don't know what to expect anymore... in a good way
